paper_abstract: This paper studies the stability of switched systems with general nonlinear disturbances. By using generalized Gronwall-Bellman inequalities, we obtain stability results for the systems with arbitrary switching laws. Finally, an example is given to illustrate the effectiveness of the results obtained. (c) 2013 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Stability analysis of switched systems with general nonlinear disturbances
